title: 37D95956-897D-4D1F-8C1C-B7D7079E6B4A
companies: Santa Clara County District Attorney's Office
fraud_tips: Educate yourself about the latest scam tactics.
Build relationships between law enforcement and local banking institutions.
Empower financial institutions with the knowledge to identify and intervene in scams.
Report suspicious activity to law enforcement.
Share your story to raise awareness and help others.
tactics: Targeting victims through social media and dating apps.
Building trust and rapport with victims over time.
Manipulating victims into investing in fake cryptocurrency or other schemes.
Using violence and coercion to control trafficked individuals.
Exploiting the elderly and vulnerable populations.
